description.brief: A collection of world, model, and launch files.

package.description:
This package is a collection of world, model, and launch files used to launch various gazebo worlds in a consistent and easy manner.
For reference, some of the materials which work well for walls and floors include:
Gazebo/White Gazebo/WoodFloor Gazebo/LightWood Gazebo/CeilingTiled Gazebo/GrayGrid Gazebo/Rocky Gazebo/Rockwall
package.author: Kevin LeBlanc
